alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Franklin County through 530 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Colrain, or near Greenfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain in excess of 1-2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Bernardston, Shelburne, Colrain, and Leyden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for western Massachusetts.
